Participate

Our next event is on April 7 and 8th in Bristol; it’s free and anyone can come along. To book a ticket for the main day on the 8th just follow this Eventbrite link. Get your ticket to find out more about the additional activities on the Friday or join our mailing list and we’ll keep you informed about everything.

Previous ThingsCamps took place in Plymouth and London. We’re going to be writing up the sessions from those events shortly.
